TITLE: Installing Proxmox Toolbox
DESCRIPTION: Command to download and execute the Proxmox toolbox script directly from GitHub repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tontonjo/proxmox_toolbox/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
wget -qO proxmox_toolbox.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tontonjo/proxmox_toolbox/main/proxmox_toolbox.sh && bash proxmox_toolbox.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Fail2Ban for Proxmox Backup Server
DESCRIPTION: These commands clone the repository, copy configuration files to the appropriate locations, and restart the Fail2Ban service to apply the changes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tontonjo/proxmox_toolbox/blob/main/pbs/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Download or clone this repository
git clone https://github.com/inettgmbh/fail2ban-proxmox-backup-server.git

# Put filter.d/proxmox-backup-server.conf contents to /etc/fail2ban/filter.d/proxmox-backup-server.conf
cp filter.d/proxmox-backup-server.conf /etc/fail2ban/filter.d/proxmox-backup-server.conf

# Put jail.d/proxmox-backup-server.conf to /etc/fail2ban/jail.d/proxmox-backup-server.conf
cp jail.d/proxmox-backup-server.conf /etc/fail2ban/jail.d/proxmox-backup-server.conf

# Restart Fail2Ban Service
systemctl restart fail2ban.service
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running System Update
DESCRIPTION: Commands to update the Proxmox system using the toolbox, either through script argument or using the created system alias.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tontonjo/proxmox_toolbox/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
bash proxmox_toolbox.sh -u
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
proxmox-update
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Backup Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Command to initiate configuration backup using the toolbox script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tontonjo/proxmox_toolbox/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
bash proxmox_toolbox.sh -b
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Fail2Ban on Proxmox Backup Server
DESCRIPTION: This command updates the package list and installs Fail2Ban on a Proxmox Backup Server.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tontonjo/proxmox_toolbox/blob/main/pbs/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
apt -y update; apt -y install fail2ban
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Storage Management Commands
DESCRIPTION: Commands for managing directory mounts and ZFS pools in Proxmox.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tontonjo/proxmox_toolbox/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
source /etc/systemd/system/mnt-datastore-$datastorename.mount
mkdir -p "$Where"
echo "$What $Where $Type $Options 0 2" >> /etc/fstab
mount -a
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
zpool import
```

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
zpool import -f $poolname
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Fail2ban Management Commands
DESCRIPTION: Commands for managing Fail2ban installation, including checking status and unbanning IP addresses.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tontonjo/proxmox_toolbox/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: ssh
CODE:
```
fail2ban-client status
```

LANGUAGE: ssh
CODE:
```
fail2ban-client status $jailname
```

LANGUAGE: ssh
CODE:
```
fail2ban-client set $jailname unbanip  $ipaddress
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Checking Proxmox Backup Server Jail Details
DESCRIPTION: This command displays detailed status information for the Proxmox Backup Server jail, including failed attempts, banned IPs, and monitored log files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tontonjo/proxmox_toolbox/blob/main/pbs/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
fail2ban-client status proxmox-backup-server
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Verifying Fail2Ban Jail Status
DESCRIPTION: This command checks the status of Fail2Ban and lists active jails to confirm the Proxmox Backup Server jail is running.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tontonjo/proxmox_toolbox/blob/main/pbs/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
fail2ban-client status
```
